sn35.142:1.2: The cause and condition that gives rise to the eye is also not-self.
sn35.142:1.3: Since the eye is produced by what is not-self, how could it be self?
sn35.142:1.8: The cause and condition that gives rise to the mind is also not-self.
sn35.142:1.9: Since the mind is produced by what is not-self, how could it be self?
sn35.142:1.11: They understand: ‘… there is no return to any state of existence.’”
